column4: How hard is it to try an alternative window manager?  How easy is it to back out and go back to the default?
Very easy. You can normally choose window manger at the login screen.
Ah, so a) is there a window manager cooler looking than enlightenment, and b) is enlightenment easy enough to try out?
Can't say, haven't tried enlightenment. I can recommend Fluxbox or Openbox though.
I don't remember who it was...
Well, Fluxbox is full of nice features, but their theme files are fucked up - doesn't matter if you're not going to write the, thought
Openbox has less features, but is more "clean"
And by the way, check out my screenshot: http://linuxin.dk/eyecandy/1457_3.jpg ;)
Don't mind the Photoshop icon, it's an old screenshots
Hurry, launch Gimp. Or open a window.
You can basically figure it out by just looking at another theme
